Name: [Deployed] Safety
Desc: Active Skill: Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a drilling attack upon hit and dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a multi-hit drilling attack upon hit and dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.</color>
